name: avenia B41844
description: avenia B41844 is slight color variations may occur with adhesives, depending on the raw materials and processes used. low-odor hot-melt adhesive with very short open and setting times and extremely good oxidation stability in the melt. this avenia hot-melt is very free-flowing and can be processed with granulate conveyors.
